{"useful_question":"4","enjoy_question":"2","easy_to_follow_question":"3","comment":"I like the different color captions showing that different character. Like blue captions from that person. {"useful_question":"4","enjoy_question":"3","easy_to_follow_question":"2","comment":"It's hard to track people who say in captions. Also, it's interesting to see smile emotions. {"useful_question":"5","enjoy_question":"4","easy_to_follow_question":"4","comment":"I like the identifiable voices, but I disagree with the gender. I suggest the neutral pronoun/gender. Perhaps, adding \"Name\" voice or \"Name's\" voice instead of assuming that's male or female.  "}
